thread.title: Israel's 1st night market inaugurated in Jerusalem
thread.title_full: Israel's 1st night market inaugurated in Jerusalem - Israel Travel, Ynetnews

author: ynetnews
title: Israel's 1st night market inaugurated in Jerusalem
text:
Tweet
Last week, all eyes were directed at Jerusalem's Keren Hayesod Street, where a shocking stabbing attack took place during the city's pride and tolerance parade. But at the same time, in a completely different and optimistic atmosphere, Jerusalem inaugurated Israel's first night market.
 Dozens of stands were set up along Jaffa Street near the Light Rail route. Fashion and jewelry designers, makeup artists, painters and other artists presented their work from the afternoon hours.
 They were accompanied by street artists, human statues and musicians.
 Watch Jerusalem's night market in action:
סגור שליחה לחבר כתובת דוא''ל של החבר שמך כתובת הדוא''ל שלך נושא הקלידו את הקוד המוצג תמונה חדשה
